pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:5.1: 82. The training rule on every year
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:6.2: At that time the nuns gave full ordination every year, and the nuns’ dwelling place did not have sufficient capacity.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:6.4: “How can the nuns give full ordination every year? The nuns’ dwelling place does not have sufficient capacity.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.4: “How can the nuns give full ordination every year?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.5: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.8: How can the nuns give full ordination every year?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.9: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:7.10: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:8.1: ‘If a nun gives full ordination in consecutive years, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:11.1: If, intending to give full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:11.2: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:11.3: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:11.4: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:11.5: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:12.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc82:13.1: The twelfth training rule is finished.
